scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:js && npm run build:html
scripts.build:js: browserify src/index.js -t babelify -p [ css-modulesify -o dist/build.css ] | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > dist/build.js
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run reload:js & npm run reload:html
scripts.prebuild: npm run lint --silent && npm run test --silent && rimraf dist && mkdirp dist
scripts.reload:html: npm run watch:html & browser-sync start --server dev --no-ui --files 'dev/*.css, dev/*.html'
scripts.reload:js: npm run watch:js & livereactload monitor dev/build.js & wait
scripts.watch:js: watchify src/index.js -t babelify -g livereactload -p [ css-modulesify -o dev/build.css ] --debug --verbose -o dev/build.js
